cause.description:
Saving Little Hearts is dedicated to helping children with congenital heart defects and their families by providing emotional assistance and educational information, primarily through the distribution of surgery care packages.
Our services are completely free to all families that have a child with a congenital heart defect.
1. help all children born with heart disease
